Grand_Prairie.Forum 303 Mall: Forum 303 Mall was a shopping mall built at Pioneer Parkway (Spur 303) and SH 360 in Arlington, Texas in the Mid-Cities between Fort Worth and Dallas. The 800,000-square-foot (74,000 m2) complex was dedicated September 19, 1970. An interesting feature of it was that it included a public amphitheater in the lower level.
